item.title: Fixing my .taskpaper reset alias for bash
item.description:
There was a little problem with my alias to reset a .taskpaper list by removing all of the @dones. It didn't remove any spaces before the @done, so each line would gain a space every day. This fixes it:

alias rst="sed -i '' 's/ *@done\(.*\)//g'"

Now it removes one …

item.title: My Newsbeuter config file
item.description:
And here's my config file that I use with Newsbeuter.

article-sort-order  date asc
auto-reload         yes
reload-time         60
show-read-feeds     no
show-read-articles  no
mark-as-read-on-hover   no
bookmark-cmd        "~/Development/bookmark"
bookmark-autopilot  no
save-path           "~/Documents/Research"
